name: The Smurfs Save the Day
summary:
The Smurfs Save the Day is an educational game in the The Smurfs franchise designed for children. It is the third title in the Smurfs video-game series, and it was one of only two games designed for use with the KidVid "voice module" system. Released as a bundle with the KidVid system, The game came with three audio cassettes that were required for gameplay. Attached to the cartridge by cables, the three cassettes each provided music and gameplay elements without which the cartridge alone would not boot.

The Smurfs Save the Day is based around the concepts of music, color, and shape. Each of the three concepts is explored individually on its own cassette. Thus, musical games can be played on the "Harmony Smurf" cassette,color games are playable on the "Greedy Smurf" cassette, and on the "Handy Smurf" cassette players are presented with games involving shape.
